title: Woman To Share $10 Bill With Alexander Hamilton In 2020
teaser: The U.S. Treasury says a woman will appear on the $10 bill starting in 2020. NPR's Melissa Block talks with Matt Wittmann of the American Numismatic Society about the history of U.S. printed currency.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
